title: Baby Milestones & Development
description:
Do you want to understand and enhance your baby's development? Pathfinder Health baby development app provides evidence-based and clinically-validated tools to track, support and celebrate your baby's milestones and development. 

Our daily plan, milestone tracker, clinical screenings, and 1,600+ brain-building activities and resources are specifically created for children from birth to age 5. 

Designed by pediatricians, Pathfinder Health milestone tracker is the only early development app that empowers you to effectively track your baby's development against CDC Milestones and the American Academy of Pediatrics clinical guidelines, identify warning signs, and provide data-driven inputs to your pediatrician.

With Pathfinder Health development tracker, new parents can say goodbye to endless online searches about what's "normal" and hello to all the tools and resources to help your newborn baby, infant, or toddler thrive:


BABY DEVELOPMENT TRACKER

Our baby development tracker provides easy-to-read charts & a visual summary of your baby's development and peace of mind knowing you can catch any potential issues early on or simply celebrate those special achievements with your little one.


BABY MILESTONE TRACKER

Your baby's first year is filled with exciting child developmental milestones. As a new parent, tracking your baby's growth and development is essential.

Our baby milestone tracker lets you anticipate, support, track, and celebrate every achievement, from newborn to toddler. Watch your baby's first steps, check your baby's growth, track your baby's milestones, and get insights to support your baby's development with Pathfinder milestone tracker. By updating developmental milestones weekly, you can ensure the most accurate representation of your baby's progress.

Parents of preemies! Our app adjusts child development milestones, ensuring accurate tracking and baby progress updates for your little one. 


SCREENING TOOLS

- The SWYC is an age-specific, comprehensive, first-level screening instrument that combines what is traditionally "developmental" with traditionally "behavioral" screening and adds screening for autism, parental depression, and other family risk factors. 

- The M-CHAT is an autism test designed to detect the early signs of autism spectrum disorder (ASD) in 18-30-month old children.


BRAIN DEVELOPMENT ACTIVITIES

Did you know that a child's brain creates more than one million new neural connections every second during the first years of life? That's why it's crucial to consistently provide a broad range of positive experiences that nurture brain development. 

Our baby development арр provides 600+ science-backed, screen-free, indoor and outdoor, fast and fun baby development games and activities that focus on reinforcing these experiences and easily fit into your everyday life.

With just 15 minutes a day, you can help your infant or toddler reach important developmental milestones and get them ready for school, friends, and life.


ARTICLES & BABY TIPS

Our library features over 1,200 age-appropriate articles & tips to support your baby's development. Discover everything you need to know about your little one's first years - from tackling challenges like tummy time to what to do if you're concerned about your baby's development. 


INVITE YOUR CARE TEAM

Invite all of your baby's caregivers to the app. Their unique milestone observations and insights are vital in understanding your child's growth and development in varied settings and will be incredibly helpful in giving your little one the best baby care possible. You and your pediatrician can provide the most comprehensive baby care for your newborn, infant or toddler by keeping track of all the milestones and important details.


CONNECT WITH US
Youtube: @pathfinderhealthapp 
Instagram: @pathfinderhealth
TikTok: @pathfinder.health

Disclaimer: Please seek a doctor's advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

summary: All-in-One Baby App: Baby Milestone Tracker, Screenings, Development Activities
